name: A MOMENT OF BLISS
description:
Important Note

This is a short and early demo for my 2D adventure game

"a moment of bliss".

Don't forget to play in fullscreen! E - to interact with objects or characters space - to continue the conversation

My social media :)

If you want to follow the game development you can support me on Patreon! Thank you so much!





Driven by the desire for wanderlust and the longing for a bit of freedom, Lotte decides to take a trip into nature.

The bus ticket has been bought, the backpack is filled with delicious sandwiches and biscuits,

blister plasters, your notebook and the next adventure is right around the corner!

take your time, leave your cares behind
        and discover the world on your own pace

collect hiking stamps for your notebook
        as a reminder of your adventure

sit down, enjoy the view and

make friends along the way

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com Music from https://pixabay.com/de/music/
